LONGDESCRIPTION: Wide-legged and low-rise, this pair of denim jeans fit tight around your hips and flare out from the knee downwards. Capable of rugged use, these jeans are durable and stay on forever in your wardrobe. These jeans have a stonewashed look portraying a dash of style and elan.
NAME: Luigi Valenti Wide-Legged Denim Jeans
